text:
@GregAbbott_TX 5. Voters want politicians to focus on the coronavirus, not reopenings

Would you be more likely to vote for a congressional candidate who ...?

Focuses more on reopening businesses: 25%

Focuses more on controlling the spread of the virus: 57%
